HD.HD-02: Paying Bills
What do I say when giving the bill?
HD.HD-03: How do I explain the total cost?
HD.HD-04: Why is it important to check the payment?
HD.HD-05: What should I do if there is a mistake?

HD.HD-02: “Here is your bill, please check it.”
HD.HD-03: “This is the total for your meal and drinks.”
HD.HD-04: “The payment must be checked for mistakes.”
HD.HD-05: “Fix the error quickly and apologize to the guest.”
